H0.text: Nonmetals are the second largest class of elements.

H1.text: Carbonates are the second largest class of elements.

H2.text: Silicates are the second largest class of elements.

H3.text: Metalloids are the second largest class of elements.

A4.text: About 15â€“20% of the 118 known elements are thus classified as nonmetals.

A5.text: Fourteen elements are almost always recognized as nonmetals.

A6.text: Boron, silicon, germanium, arsenic, antimony, and tellurium are commonly recognised as metalloids.
